home.parrafo-info: I am a Systems Engineer with experience in automation and frontend web development. I am passionate about creating projects with intuitive and aesthetically pleasing designs to offer the best possible user experience.

sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_aboutMe:
Hello! I am a Systems Engineer specialized in automation, with solid experience in web development and a focus on Frontend programming.
My goal is to advance in the professional world of Web Development to continue gaining experience, expanding my knowledge, and strengthening my career. I am eager to face new challenges and learn from every opportunity that arises.

In addition, I have extensive experience as an automator using Power Platform and Power Apps. These tools allow me to efficiently and effectively create automated business solutions.

As a systems engineering professional, I have a strong technical foundation that complements my skills in Web Development. This unique combination allows me to approach projects from both a technical and analytical perspective.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, which facilitates effective teamwork and assertive communication. My proactive approach and problem-solving ability allow me to confidently face challenges and find creative solutions.

I am committed to my professional growth and enjoy learning from my peers and continuously improving myself. I am excited for the opportunity to contribute and grow in the field of Web Development while continuing to pursue my passion for automation and technological innovation.

contacto.text: Complete the form below and I will contact you as soon as possible.
